findings.title: Inconsistent Code Style in P00lsTokenCreator::claim
findings.description: The `claim` function checks that the account did not claim tokens yet via: Given the code style used throughout the project, the `P00lsTokenCreator::isClaimed` function should maybe be `public` and then using that function instead of the inlined access via `__claimedBitMap.get(index)` statement.

findings.title: Inconsistent Usage of uint vs uint256 in UniswapV2Pair
findings.description: The project uses `uint256` type declaration, but the UniswapV2 forked codebase uses `uint`. The variable `UniswapV2Pair::MINIMUM_LIQUIDITY` was changed from `uint` to `uint256`, suggesting to change the declaration again to `uint256` for consistency.

findings.title: Files containing more than one contract
findings.description: For clarity’s sake it would make sense to split the VestingFactory.sol and the RegistyOwnable.sol files into multiple sub-files to contain a single contract in each of them.

findings.title: Unnecessary use of the virtual keyword
findings.description: The owner, transferOwnership, cliff, and delegate functions are declared virtual, although there is no apparent reason to do so.
